summary: Replace per-node maintenance mode Swarm jobs with a single Redis key

changes.description: Maintenance mode is now toggled via a Redis key (maintenance:flag in DB 2) instead of creating one-shot Docker Swarm jobs on every node. This eliminates the fragile per-node job orchestration that caused deploy failures when task creation failed on individual nodes (e.g. create_failed on workers). Requires the MageZero_ClusterMaintenance Magento module to be installed.
